title: Environmental Innovation & Entrepreneurship Roundtable Delegate
description: As one of 26 U.S. delegates to the 3-week Japan–America Student Conference (Kyoto, Osaka, Kumamoto, Tokyo), contributed to cross-cultural research on environmental technology, entrepreneurship, and policy through weekly pre-conference sessions and on-site programming.

Participated in site visits and briefings including the Urasenke tea ceremony, a Noh performance, Kyoto’s startup ecosystem (POJ Studio), Osaka Expo youth ambassadors, TMC factory tour, testimonies from atomic bomb survivors, and a Kyoto Fusioneering session on fusion energy.
Co-developed a U.S. state bill and delivered a capstone presentation advancing next-generation nuclear fission policy.

title: Milstein Summer Experience at Cornell Tech
description: Selected as 1 of 25 scholars from thousands of Cornell undergrads for an intensive 8-week program at Cornell Tech.
Developed proficiency in 3D modeling (Fusion 360), 3D printing, laser cutting, Adobe Illustrator, and vinyl cutting.
Engineered a real-time speech transcription system using Whisper X, a microphone, and an ESP32 microcontroller.
Analyzed data from New York City’s Participatory Budgeting initiative and proposed policies to reduce urban pollution.

title: Software Developer
description: Drive development of community-focused tech products as part of a selective 94-member team.
Collaborated with a team of 9 to optimize internal tools platform & develop team public website using React.
Built interview dashboard to automate applicant tracking, saving leads 10+ hours/week.

title: Campus Strategist
description: Led outreach efforts that increased platform use by 79% across Cornell.
Built 10 collaborative sponsorships in 2 weeks to promote AI adoption.
Initiated partnership for CU Design-a-thon, boosting visibility to 130+ student designers.

title: Participant
description: Developed prototype for IKanji, an AI-powered kanji study app.
Conducted 8 customer discovery interviews with Japanese learners.
Completed workshops on startup strategy and operations.

title: Senior Barista & Social Media Manager
description: Managed Instagram, achieving a 3565.5% increase in reach and 483.8% rise in profile visits in 2 months.
Trained 4 new team members on drink preparation, store protocols, and customer service.
